text: Hello. How are you today?
I am good. How are you?
I am fantastic. Thank you for asking.
I'm glad. Are you from the States?
I am. Actually a teacher in the states. What about you what do you do for a living?
I work in Car sales
Oh yea? Does that make a great impact on the peoples lives ?
It can, not like a teacher can, but if a person buys a car that they absolutely love, they leave happy and excited
Always good to make somone excited. Can even vastly improve on their lives. Ever felt bad for someone who couldn't afford the car you were trying to sell, but knew they really needed one?

yes, I do, but most of the time, people come in and say this is what I can afford? Can I get this and if I say no, but you could get this, they are generally happy. Do you teach young kids or older kids?

I currently teach young kids. Mostly in urban communities who are low income and in need of good caring teachers. Keeping them off the streets and such. Most usually need some sort of help. What kind of area do you work in?

I work in a rural area...Most of where I live in rural and country, lol. Its kinda like the urban kids...people think just because we are country we are bumpkins but we really arent. I bet the kids you teach are thankful for good teachers like you
But of course they love me. Kids in different areas are still kids lol. Urban and rural both have their challenges. Have you ever helped kids or is their little time for that?
I try to as much as I can. I have two that I\'ve "adopted" because their parents chose drugs over them and I spend as much time with them as I can
Oh so you know all about helping already. We need people who adopt and take care of those who were abandoned. Ever donated to one of those save the kids charities?
no I haven't. I prefer to spend time mentoring over monatary donations

I'm the same way. However, every bit helps especially when I am so busy mentoring the kids after school. Sometimes, I just throw a dollar or 2 out to help a kid get some food or a snack. Heck just to reward them for not hanging around the rough streets with the drugs.
well yeah I've done that but not donated to a charitable organization
Hypothetical... if you could give a kid a dollar or 2 right now for some food to eat.. even for one meal.. would you?
yes I would...kids should never go hungry for any reason, its not their fault if their parents can't afford to feed them or what not. would you do the same
Of course and I alway do lol. I can give the chance to do so right now if you would like?
If I was to donate a $1 would you match it?
I sure would.
Than we have reached a donation agreement true?
Sounds about right. Mind if it is deducted from your task payment?
I absolutely do not mind at all
Alright then a donation of 1$ will be deducted from your task payment. I am sure you have just made a child day.. once again.
